publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5069 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Lung Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament welcomes Global Lung Cancer Awareness Month 2006; notes that lung cancer is Scotland’s biggest cancer killer for men and women; welcomes news that rates of lung cancer in men have dropped by 27% in the last decade but notes with concern that rates among women continue to rise; further notes that survival rates for lung cancer remain poor, partly as a result of most patients being diagnosed at an advanced stage; congratulates Macmillan Cancer Support and the Roy Castle Lung Cancer Foundation on their campaign "Finding Lung Cancer Early Saves Lives", and supports the need for improved promotion of the early diagnosis message.

S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Mr Jim Wallace*, Stewart Stevenson*, John Swinburne*, Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*, Bruce Crawford*, Christine May*, Murray Tosh*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Fergus Ewing*, Alex Fergusson*, Patrick Harvie*, John Home Robertson*, Kate Maclean*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Marlyn Glen*, Sarah Boyack*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael McMahon*, Robin Harper*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr David Davidson*, Janis Hughes*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Peattie*, Pauline McNeill*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S2M-5069 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Lung Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament welcomes Global Lung Cancer Awareness Month 2006; notes that lung cancer is Scotland’s biggest cancer killer for men and women; welcomes news that rates of lung cancer in men have dropped by 27% in the last decade but notes with concern that rates among women continue to rise; further notes that survival rates for lung cancer remain poor, partly as a result of most patients being diagnosed at an advanced stage; congratulates Macmillan Cancer Support and the Roy Castle Lung Cancer Foundation on their campaign "Finding Lung Cancer Early Saves Lives", and supports the need for improved promotion of the early diagnosis message. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace, Stewart Stevenson, John Swinburne, Jackie Baillie, Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Dr Elaine Murray, Trish Godman, Bruce Crawford, Christine May, Murray Tosh, Mrs Nanette Milne, Fergus Ewing, Alex Fergusson, Patrick Harvie, John Home Robertson, Kate Maclean, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Marlyn Glen, Sarah Boyack, Eleanor Scott, Tommy Sheridan, Michael McMahon, Robin Harper, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Janis Hughes, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Ms Maureen Watt, Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Peattie, Pauline McNeill, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Shiona Baird*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Paul Martin*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Dave Petrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Scott Barrie*, Dennis Canavan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Ms Sandra White*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Helen Eadie*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-5069 Lung Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 1 November 2006) Susan Deacon*
